title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama models for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama; manage models and conversations in the browser.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama exposing synchronous and asynchronous APIs with POJO models.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem to chat, generate embeddings, and administer Ollama from Ruby/Rails apps.

title: ollama-cli-copilot
summary: Lightweight CLI wrapper that brings local AI pair-programming to bash/zsh with Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-copilot.vim
summary: Vim plugin fork that swaps GitHub Copilot backend for a local Ollama model for privacy.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama with async enumerable streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-gui-framework
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI (Tauri + React) for Ollama model management and chatting.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for integrating Ollama into Go services with minimal dependencies.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-model-registry
summary: Curated registry of Modelfiles for Llama 3, Phi-3, CodeLlama, Mistral, and community fine-tunes.

title: ollama-obsidian-plugin
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an AI sidebar powered by any Ollama model for note brainstorming.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-dependent code in pipelines.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings local Ollama completions into enterprise Slack workspaces.
